website_summaries.verdict: The table of choice when space is at a premium. Narrow for tight spaces.
pros: Table provides just enough play and work space for a few kids sitting or standing
cons: Not suitable for larger groups of children

customer_reviews.title: Good size for growing boys!
customer_reviews.text: We love that it's taller and wider than our current table. We have an almost 6 year old and 4 year old. Table is perfect for the oldest. Table is a little tall for the 4 year old, but he'll grow into it fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kori Kurbiel

customer_reviews.title: Great Table, Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: If only I could give this product more stars! First of all, it is an extremely sturdy table with an easy care top that will take children's inevitable spills, smears, and messes. Secondly, when folded flat, it can be laid on the floor, serving as an ideal surface for building blocks and magna-tiles creative fun. Finally, it is easy to store when not in use. I am absolutely thrilled with this table!
customer_reviews.author: Martha G Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Nice tables. The surface is rough so kids can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice tables. The surface is rough so kids can't color on them without something flat and smooth under their papers.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Anglemyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with the Lifetime children’s chairs.
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect with the lifetime children’s chairs. Easier (and cheaper) to purchase the table and chairs separately than as a set. Chairs might be available cheap at Sams or Costco in various colors. Table is not very strong to stand on or put super heavy stuff on but works for its intended purpose. With collapsible legs you can put the table away when not in use. I like the almond color table top because dirt is not easy to see as with a white top. It’s a perfect kids/ toddler’s table.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P

customer_reviews.title: Product great, packaging not so much
customer_reviews.text: Well my rating would have been lower had it not been for the fact that I was covering the surface of the table with Lego compatible stick on plates. It came with a dent in the table. Packaging stated what the item is, so be aware. And the box was torn open in the side. See photos. But if it weren't for these things the product deserves 5 stars. Works great for my 5 year old for now, and his younger brother will get use out of it one day I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table was sent in a nice box but the table has a big hole
customer_reviews.text: Completely no quality control. The box was intact and seemed sturdy. Who would send a defective item just like that. The table has a big hole. It’s plastic so it looked like it was burned, yet they boxed it and sent it to the buyer anyway. Waste of money and I won’t be inconvenienced to return it since it’s a big item. Update: tried to resolve this with Amazon. 3 different customer support reps just passed the buck hoping I’ll get tired. I did get tired. Basically, they can’t just replace although totally damaged and not my fault, they can refund but I have to ship the heavy item back and they won’t pay for shipping back. Amazon doesn’t care.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome awesome purchase. I bought it for my two year old to use as an art table. I wanted something that folded so I could put it away. This table is great. Perfect size for a toddler, sturdy, and open and closes quickly and easily. Couldn't have asked for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Lb

customer_reviews.title: Very well built kids table.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect replacement to the small children’s tables with the soft tops that normaly have characters on them. My son demolished one of those but this table is VERY well built and sturdy. Much stronger then one of the other character style tables. Hard smooth surface for coloring, legos etc.. table is almost the exact same height and surface size has the other character tables. Does not come with chairs but we knew that just letting ya know.
customer_reviews.author: C&T of Rome

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: Love the table. Quite sturdy for playing, eating, or learning! Foldable and spacious enough for toddler and young kids! I purchased the option that said “used” to save some money, but the table looks like new! Absolutely nothing wrong with it! I am 5’3 tall and if I sit on a 12” toddler chair, it is perfect for me to sit with my toddler. .... My son can enjoy it standing or sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little kids table!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little table for my 6 year old! Easy to set up and put down- folding legs. Light weight. Table top cleans up super easy too! I’m 5’3 and often sit and play at this table with my little guy comfortably!
customer_reviews.author: Amber P.

customer_reviews.title: Best kids table ever
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a table for my son, but seeing his cousins character tables that get destroyed, we didn't want to keep replacing it so we found this table and would not trade it for the world! It is durable for the fact my son likes to climb on it and jump off it onto the couch but is great for him to eat at, do puzzles, color and work on his learning and he won't be 2 until September. This table will last him until he outgrows it and then we will even be able to give it to someone else who can use it. Built to last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kid's table - very functional and sturdy! They had them at local store for a much better price - but were sold out when I got there. I also purchased the matching chairs and they are also sturdy enough of an adult man to sit on. The table is a great height for small children (2-8) to do projects or drawings, or for eating on at birthday parties.
customer_reviews.author: Blondy5

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect height for so many things. It is a great children's table but we mostly use our out on the patio or on the deck where we sit our appetizers and beverages in nice weather. It is big enough and just the right height to set in the middlle of 4 - 6 chairs. It is also a great folding table to take camping or in the RV for outside or inside use. We take it with us in the RV and set it up in front of the sofa for a coffee table then use it again later in the day outside for snacks and beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids' Table! (Preschool-4th grade child size)
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my young-elementary school-aged children! They are using it as a craft table along with the "NISUNS OT01 Linen Folding Storage Ottoman Cube Footrest, 12 X 12 X 12 Inches" as seats, that can also store their art supplies. These cubes are a great fit to pair with the table! I love how everything can be tucked away when we're not using it. Definitely recommend as a next-size-up from the typical smaller plastic children's play tables.
customer_reviews.author: HeartRocks

customer_reviews.title: Too Glossy/slippery for Dishes
customer_reviews.text: the table works, as far as folding and unfolding adequately, and is a good size and height for 2-year-olds. We haven't been able to use it as intended for mealtimes, though, because the surface of the table is so slick. If it were your standard formica or fake wood top, that would be fine--I couldn't find such a thing here, or I'd have gotten it. This table also needs something on the underside of the legs to keep it from sliding on tiled floors.
customer_reviews.author: Initials Only

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these tables! I run a large daycare, and have used the vinyl tables. The vinyl tables were ripped within a very short time and usually collapsed very soon. These tables are heavy duty Construction! Not paints, not food, not anything has staied them or broken them. I love these and have recommended them to many people who also have bought and love them. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Brissey

customer_reviews.title: We need a cover for our Doggie Litter box outside
customer_reviews.text: We put this over our dog's litter box on out porch to shield the litter box from rain. Works great. Will make it even more weather proof by covering with a plastic tarp. Works great for my application. The build quality and durabilty is remarkably better than those old card tables for children. It would make a perfect play table for kids or an extra child-table for holiday dinner seating. You could also use it more many other uses around the home - like a little table to hold house plants.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: sturdy table for crafts/distance learning
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of table. Its perfect for my 5 year old and will grow with her. Bought it for distance learning and it provides her enough space for chromebook, mouse/mousepad and to do assignments. She also uses it to do crafts and the paint/glue wipes off easily. Very easy to clean and sturdy. Solid table. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime 80425 Kids Folding Table
customer_reviews.text: If you need a camping table, a kids table or any small table this is the one. Made very well, I wasted my money on a aluminum small table you will see as camping table. Junk. This is so much better. Buy this, you won't be sorry. But remember it only 21 1/2" tall. I put it next to my chair in the man cave as a end table. Works GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Carbinekid

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: With home schooling before kids can go back to school I had to get table that would hold lap top and all their items. This table fit the bill. It's not only big enough but very well built. And it is easy to fold up and put away. I would recommend this to every one .
customer_reviews.author: Linda a king

customer_reviews.title: Durable and trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: We needed an extra table, but didn't want a table that would take up room all the time. This is perfect for that! The durability and sturdiness is amazing. There isn't anything I wouldn't feel comfortable sitting on this table because I know it would hold it. We will be using this for years and years to come and have had many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: The product is very sturdy, so much so that my 2 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this table for my 2 year old to use as her own table. The product is very sturdy, so much so that my 2 year old enjoys climbing and standing on top of it. The quality is as good as their bigger tables that we have purchased and with the kid sized chairs, this is perfect for use for her to sit and eat or watch TV or play with her tea set.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked a solid wood table
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of researching before I decided to buy this table for my granddaughter. Ideally, I would have liked a solid wood table, but the cost was prohibitive, and since my son and dil have a small home, I wanted a folding table they could put away when necessary. Having owned several Lifetime tables, I felt confident in my purchase. This one did not disappoint. It is very sturdy and good looking. Will hold up to all my gd's climbing and standing (she is, after all, only 2!) The only disappointment is that Lifetime does not make matching folding chairs. But I found a nice set to go with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Worked really well in the playroom
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of grandkids visiting over the holidays. I got this for an extra surface for them to use in the playroom. Lifetime is a good sturdy brand. It is on the heavy side but that's what makes it good quality. I also got the kid size chairs which are terrific as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cow Town Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I own several lifetime tables so when I learned they made a child sized one I had to get it. I love how sturdy and functional their tables are...this is great for crafts and play doh clean up is a breeze nice hard surface for kids to color or do homework on.
customer_reviews.author: itsbritt

customer_reviews.title: Great Folding Table
customer_reviews.text: We have a small house. I’m always looking for clever ways to use my limited space and with a grandson it becomes even more challenging. I needed a small table for our grandson. A table I could use on his visits. Sturdy and well made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MariaG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a coloring/activity table for my 2 year old. I purchased the Lifetime brand kid chairs to go with it. It’s a great height for him to be able to sit at comfortably now but it’s big enough that he can use it for years to come. It has the same sturdy quality as the adult size version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: I needed added seating on my deck for family. This table is so convenient, it can be folded and stored in my deck closet when not in use. It’s small but big enough for 4 toddlers to have dinner. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good strong table for children and adults.
customer_reviews.text: I love Lifetime table. Am and artist, and while they may take a beating from my acrylics, they do fantastic with watercolours and children's art projects. These little tables are a good height and size for one or two small children to sit and colour. Is a nice base for the Woodzeez Tree house.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: So Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So sturdy. So strong. We didn’t need a chair, just the table. This one is so strong my kids can dance on it (but we don’t let them). We expect it to last a lifetime (ha!) Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ormsby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beyond the toddler age.
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 and still likes to sit at these little tables to do things. I replaced his toddler Diego table with this and it’s great. It’s taller than those themed tables and he fits perfectly at it. The surface does have some texture so if you are using it as a drawing table, you would just need a smooth surface to put down.
customer_reviews.author: mandamarierose

customer_reviews.title: Great little table for children's activities
customer_reviews.text: Just the right height for my grandchildren to use for coloring, putting together puzzles, and eating. Also realized good for me to wrap gifts etc. Love the neutral color and easy to fold and put away when not in use. Also top not padded.
customer_reviews.author: susan sherbo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table! I wanted something that will last a long time and was easy to clean and this sure fits the bill. My little one is 2 and there is room for her grow still. I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kf2222

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great to use
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy small desks for 3 kindergarten students doing virtual learning at my house. These are absolutely perfect! They can be moved easily depending if the students need to move to different areas of the room. They fold and stored away when not needed too. I will say that I use them on concrete floor and not on carpet, so I cannot say anything about the sturdiness on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Fern

customer_reviews.title: Love the table so much I bought 2
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great table for your little person and a college student. I initially bought this for my son and my daughter liked it so much that I bought another one for her to use while being with us in the living room. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chentell Shores

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. It is super easy to put up and take down. My 6 year old can do it all by himself. It is very sturdy and doesn't wobble. We use this table for just about everything. I love that it folds flat so it is very easy to store when not in use!
customer_reviews.author: M. Stepp

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is just the right hight for our grandson. He is 2 1/2 and 28 inches tall. He loves playing at the table with me or by himself. We bought 2 of the ECR4 Kids chairs (in blue) to go with the table. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: gbrams

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this Table
customer_reviews.text: I use it for two toddlers and am confident that they aren’t going to flip it over from leaning on it. We use it for a reading/art table and then it is easy to move to the kitchen for a lunch table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent children's table
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent table for my grandchildren. They have used it for a number of years and it is still as good as new. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime knows their product
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain about this company's products. I own quite a few, and I love them. This is the perfect height. Used two side by side for a kids buffet table at my recent house party for the kids play area.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Garland

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Could not for the life of me find a table I liked for my toddler until this one. It food easily and its sturdy and light weight. He can play or have a snack on it. Good purchase ! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler absolutely love this table. Perfect to stand at for them to do crafts and perfect to sit at to eat at as well. Great value for such a study table for twins who crawl all over everything.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great craft table for little kids
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my grand-son's craft projects. Easy to wash, but not a worry if he gets paint on it. I'd rather have paint on his play table than my dining room table. Easy to fold up and lightweight enough to not be a heavy burden.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT KIDS TABLE
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this for my 3 year old but my 6 and 9 year old also use it comfortably ! it is very sturdy and i love that it can be folded up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: F. Amar

customer_reviews.title: Great table for all kid-related activities and more!
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Perfect size for my kids to use for all kinds of activities and eating. The adults use it too. Really sturdy and easy to put away and take out. Because it’s really sturdy, it weighs a little more, but still pretty easy to use and worth the extra weight.
customer_reviews.author: Romi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kids table
customer_reviews.text: We've had several "puffy top" tables for the grand-kids that barely last a year. Bought the Lifetime table after using several of their other products and happy that the quality made it down to this small table. For the six year old and under crowd this is a great little table. sturdy, easy to clean and store out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Suitable table for growing toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Small in size but good height, perfect for my 5 year old. We use it for his ABA and for play we got the chairs in green and blue a nice contrast to the almond table. The lip doesnt keep anything from rolling off but the roundness is better than sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Clarice Silence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Table For Any Child
customer_reviews.text: My five year old LOVES his table and does everything on it from eating to playing with his toys. It’s very sturdy, well made, and I couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great slightly taller toddler/kids table
customer_reviews.text: Great kids table. We like that it is a little taller than most others so we will be able to get a few more years of use than the shorter ones which kids outgrow quicker. It’s a tad bit too high for our average sized four year olds but they can still easily eat a meal, do crafts, coloring, and games on this table.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great table used for a 3 year old, very sturdy and easy to fold. Used for schoolwork, eating and playing. Super easy to clean too
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Durable Table.
customer_reviews.text: A solidly, durable little table that can handle a good amount of weighr. My gf and i use it for our portable washer so we dont have to do any heavy lifting to let the water drain out between rinse cycles, but honestly, whatever your needs might be, it's a solid purchase I can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Best table out there for ease of use and clean up.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best table I have bought for my grand daughters. Great for their drawing and Lego play. Great value for money spent. I have a larger one from the same company and would recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for study time
customer_reviews.text: Table can be store easily and fun for play time. Board games and crafts. We will also be using it for school work pretty soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Great Table for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this little table. I especially like that I can tuck it away after using it to save space. The material it is made of it great to wipe off leftover marker and crayons. My kids also enjoy having their snacks at it. Best buy for the amount.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: My favorite table!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table and i bring this table almost everywhere In the car, for picnic etc. It is easy to fold, easy to carry, easy to use. I live in the small room and this tables saves my space.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Table
customer_reviews.text: This is just what i was looking for - had older oak school house chairs that are rather tall and would not fit under most child size folding tables - the chairs fit great with plenty of room for their legs and my 2 year old granddaughters love it - i especially like the grooved edge that catches any spilled liquid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store in garage for visits from my grandchildren. I also bought folding safety-first folding kids chairs from Walmart for $10. The table is a mini version of the 4 and 6 foot tables we store for parties, etc. It should last for ever!
customer_reviews.author: K Ren

customer_reviews.title: Will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: This has lasted us over a year now and is wonderful. It is taller than most kids tables so it will last longer and the top is easy to clean! However it is not a smooth surface so you will need something under if just writing on a sheet of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime children’s table
customer_reviews.text: Great table for toddlers! It’s made by lifetime what else is there to say.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Children's fold up table is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this solid fold-up table! My grandchildren can play their games, color pictures and even it meals on it. it sturdy, durable and cleans easily! Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Pam  Browning

customer_reviews.title: Small portable sturdy folding table
customer_reviews.text: It is a great small table for my kid to do crafts outside in the yard. When a friend is coming over this becomes a small picnic table. Easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Buy this table! Don't waste your money on the others!
customer_reviews.text: This table is sturdy, very well made, looks nice, and is easy to clean! I run a daycare and have went through so many of those padded square tables! They are a waste of money! I wish I would have bought this table years ago! This table will last and was a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was surprised by how sturdy this table is. Very well made. Definitely worth the price. Fit perfectly where I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Great for young kids. They have chairs that also go with it. We have that set. Love it! Works great for birthday parties as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for accommodating little ones. It's strong, nice looking and folds up. So glad I bought it for my grandson and he fits perfectly, at 4 years old, at the table for drawing, eating and reading.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and solid
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and solid, heavy enough to keep it from accidentally being pushed around the room. Giving 4 instead of 5 stars only because it's kind of a utility thing rather than an object of affection (according to the review instructions, 5 stars means "I love it"). I do recommend it, especially for households that have only sporadic visits by children.
customer_reviews.author: M. Casella

customer_reviews.title: Great table and chairs!
customer_reviews.text: The best childs table available. I’ve tried many different brands and this plus the matching chairs are the best. It’s very convenient that the table folds away to save room when the kiddos are away. The chairs are stable and do not tip over like others I’ve had. Other models seem cheap compared to this one. You won’t be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Study and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very nice transition for my 2 year old from her high chair.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect functionality
customer_reviews.text: Great Grandchildren loved having a place to eat and play! Recommend this to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Inez E. Couch

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler table for crafts
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy, we're very pleased! Cousins have had this same table for years, so we expect it to last a long time (aptly named brand for the quality of their products!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: These tables were purchased to replace desks in our PreK and Kindergarten classroom. They are working out great because they give the students more workspace and we don't have to worry about fingers getting smashed when closing the desk top. They are also very sturdy and easy to open and close, but still light enough that they are easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: This table is very sturdy for a folding table and is a quality product
customer_reviews.text: This table is very sturdy for a folding table and is a quality product. I wanted a folding table for a grandchild to use when he came over. I can put it aside when he is not here. This table is ever bit as sturdy as any of the children's table that do not fold up. 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: jjb

customer_reviews.title: Best Children’s Table on the market!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT Table. Sturdy, lightweight, easy to fold, all around best children’s table on the market. Also, it’s easy to clean! My grandchildren love it! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BK Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Happy toddler
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and we use it for everything. Eating, crafts, watching movies. It’s really a huge part of our toddler life. P
customer_reviews.author: Torrey

customer_reviews.title: Great table with ease of storing and multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect kids size table. It’s light weight and very sturdy. I love the spill lip on the edge of it- perfect for runaway drinks or crayons at art time. It is very easy to clean with either app and water. Crayon or other marks on it comes up super easy with a magic eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Unger

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: We were having a party and several people were bringing their kids so I scrambled to get 2 of these tables before the date. They arrived on time and are incredibly sturdy. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This table is amazing! I bought it so my kids can eat in the kitchen and I am so glad I did. I had a disney table before but the kids destroyed it, so I looked for something stronger and so far so good. The best part is that it does not stain, so after a messy pasta day, I wipe and go.
customer_reviews.author: Kerline Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Table
customer_reviews.text: Love the table - very sturdy. The top was smaller than I had imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Judy D.

customer_reviews.title: Very stable table.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very stable, secure leg locks, easy to fold and unfold legs. I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Classicalmusiclover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Small Folding Table
customer_reviews.text: Not fancy but well made, sturdy, nice compact size for functional use if Small is what you're looking for
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: I love this table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy table. It is slightly taller than the kids padded tables but I feel the kids will be able to use it longer. We used a cheap kids painting set and the paint stained the table but that's what it's for anyway. I like that it has a lip all the way around it which has helped contain spills and catch crayons when they roll off.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Bissonnette

customer_reviews.title: Great table for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with with sturdiness and how quickly table sets up. Would recommend table.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime table
customer_reviews.text: Can with a bent leg so when u go to fold it to put away it doesn’t want to fold up right
customer_reviews.author: Niki E.

customer_reviews.title: Great little table!
customer_reviews.text: Great little table I have the chairs to match and so I ordered the table as well. I only one star away for the bumpy texture the table top has which isn’t the best for writing or coloring but it does the trick for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price is right for this sturdy little table of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect little table for my grandsons to eat at and do activities. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy but a little hard for my mom to close ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace an old table my mom had for the grandkids that was falling apart. It is very sturdy but a little hard for my mom to close up at 76. I’m sure it will outlast her. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: It's built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: This table will support 200 lbs, no problem. I use it as a mixer stand. I bolted my 16-channel mixer case with mixer directly to this little table and gig with it regularly. It's built like a tank!!!
customer_reviews.author: Straightforward62

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: We, my grandkids and I love this table. Very sturdy and quality. Thanks to the representative who assisted me during my delivery. We received this table a little late, but thanks to the representative who made sure there was a happy ending.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Bah

customer_reviews.title: Worth it's weight in gold
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson who uses it daily. Great quality, great price and will never lose it's value. You cannot find a better children's table.
customer_reviews.author: K.S. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for little spaces
customer_reviews.text: I needed an extra children's table for my classroom. This is great because I can fold it up and put it away when we are finished!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Need I say more? This is what we paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Savilliams

customer_reviews.title: right size for young kids
customer_reviews.text: got this table for grandson to play with his legos. it is the perfect height for him.also it is very well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece. We wanted a sturdy one so she could climb all over it and be fine. And it doesn't disappoint!! It's sturdy, durable and just her size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller living spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my toddler. I also like the fact that it folds up and can be put away when not in use. Great for places with less space.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: My boys like the table, can fold to take anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: It works great for sitting on the couch putting together puzzles.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Could be bigger
customer_reviews.text: Just a tad to small in terms of area. A goo height though
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice side table or kids table, very well made and and rugged.
customer_reviews.author: jaes j Crystoff

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: One leg doesn’t fold as easier than the others but that is the only issue. Glad that I bought it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little table-does have slightly bumpy surface
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great table for little ones. I love that it can fold up and be easily moved or put away. My son is 18 months old, and utilizes this table for activities like puzzles, coloring books, etc. We have a lifetime chair for the table, and he still has to grow quite a bit before his feet will touch the ground, but he likes that he can climb in and out of the chair and sit at the table on his own will. The table does have little bumps on the surface, so it's not great for coloring if there is nothing between a sheet of paper and the table.
customer_reviews.author: Julz

product_meta.title: Lifetime 80425 Kids Folding Table, Almond, 24”
product_meta.description: Color:AlmondLifetime Children's Square Folding Tables are constructed of high-density polyethylene and are perfect for all sorts of childhood projects and games. They will not crack, chip or peel and are built for indoor and outdoor use. The patented steel frame design provides a sturdy foundation and is protected with a powder-coated, weather-resistant finish. Perfect for young kids, Lifetime Children's Square Folding Tables are ideal for painting, playdough, or their next snack time.Caps prevent floors from getting scratched
feature_bullets: Constructed of High Density Polyethylene for superior strength and durability; Backed by a 1-year limited manufacturer
Lightweight design; Designed for children ages 3-9. Rust-resistant powder-coated Steel frame
Uv-protected top is stain resistant and easy to clean
Folds flat for easy storage and transportation; open dimensions- 24" L x 24" w x 21" H; closed - 24 in. W x 24 in. D x 2 in. H
All-weather resistant; designed for indoor and outdoor use
